ValidationRule.description: Requires a completed Content Studio project to have the "Final PDF URL" field populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Id = "0125Y000001bPG9" && OR( ISBLANK(Completion_Date__c), Completion_Date__c >= DATEVALUE( "2022-01-01" ) ) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Product__c , "Sponsored Article") ) && Product_Group__c <> "Custom Video" && Product_Group__c <> "ICYMI" && Product_Group__c <> "Webinar" && Product_Group__c <> "Roundtable" && Product_Group__c <> "Virtual Q&A" && Product_Group__c <> "Custom" && Product_Group__c <> "Demand Gen" && (Project_Status_Display__c = "Product Delivered") && ISBLANK(Final_PDF_URL__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Copy link to the final PDF saved to project's sFiles and paste that link in the Final PDF URL field. If there is no final PDF, input "n/a".
